item.title: Coffee Hours - Every Monday
item.description:
Join us every Monday for PhD Coffee Hour!

When: Mondays at 2:30 PM
Where: CSE Building

Where ideas brew over coffee and pastries. New students especially welcome! ‚òï

item.title: Social Hours - Fun Fridays in CSE
item.description:
End your week on a high note with Fun Fridays in CSE! Join us for games, snacks, and great conversations.

When: Fridays, 4:00 PM - 6:00 PM
Where: CSE Graduate Lounge

What We Have

  • üéÆ Video games (Switch, board games, card games)
  • üçï Pizza and snacks
  • ü•§ Drinks and refreshments
  • üé≤ Board game library

Everyone is welcome - bring a friend or come solo!

item.title: Fall Quarter Townhall - November 2025
item.description:
Join us for our quarterly townhall meeting where we discuss important department matters and gather your feedback!

Date: Friday, November 22, 2025
Time: 3:00 PM - 4:30 PM
Location: CSE 4140 (Zoom link provided)

Why Attend?

  • Voice concerns directly to department leadership
  • Stay informed about department decisions
  • Shape GSC programs and initiatives
  • Make your voice heard

Your participation matters! See you there.
